title: Cowboy Bebop: The Complete Series On Blu-Ray Is Only $18 At Amazon

description:
Total War: Warhammer 3 lets you challenge knights, sorcerers, behemoths, daemons, and everything in between. Now, a new DLC promises additional strategic layers as you conquer the known world. Here's our guide that discusses the Total War: Warhammer 3 - Omens of Destruction legendary lords.

Total War: Warhammer 3 - Omens of Destruction legendary lords guide

Total War: Warhammer 3 - Omens of Destruction lets you choose from three legendary lords: Golgfag Maneater of the Ogre Kingdoms, Gorbad Ironclaw of the Greenskins, and Skulltaker of the forces of Khorne. You can purchase each leader separately or as part of a bundle. Moreover, a free-DLC--also known as free-LC--adds Arbaal the Undefeated.

title: Total War: Warhammer 3 - Omens Of Destruction Best Lords To Pick

description:
The Lord of the Rings has returned to theaters with the new anime movie The War of the Rohirrim, which is set 183 years before Peter Jackson's film trilogy. The movie was animated by anime studio Sola Digital Arts, and features several production alums from Peter Jackson's Lord of the Rings and The Hobbit trilogies, including producer and co-writer Philippa Boyens, who also co-wrote the screenplays for Jackson's films.

The War of the Rohirrim is based on writing found in the appendices of The Lord of the Rings. Specifically, it focuses on the kingdom of Rohan and its best-known ruler, Helm Hammerhand (voiced by Brian Cox). King Hammerhand's reign coincided with the war against the people of Dúnedain. The war with Dunlending raiders for control of the kingdom is the central conflict in the anime. Helm's Deep, the site of a pivotal battle in The Two Towers, gets its name from Hammerhand.

The War of the Rohirrim just released in theaters Dece
title: The Lord Of The Rings: War Of The Rohirrim Figures, Funko Pops, And More Merch Available Now

description:
Nintendo's new console might be coming as soon as 2025, and while it won't spell the immediate end for Nintendo Switch, which is approaching its eighth anniversary, it's certainly approaching the end of its life cycle. 2024 was a year in which we nevertheless saw an innovative new Zelda game, and Mario and friends continued to pop up left and right.

In picking the five best Nintendo Switch games of 2024, we opted to choose from console exclusives, meaning games that you won't find on any other consoles (games with PC releases are eligible). That left us with a list largely dominated by Nintendo itself, which isn't terribly uncommon, although we did have one third-party release that stood out from the crowd.

title: The Best Nintendo Switch-Exclusive Games Of 2024

description:
Across four decades, five films, a TV series, and one of the best games of the year, Indiana Jones has been one a mainstay of pop culture. There's a good chance that there's someone in your home who's a massive fan of the character, and with the globetrotting archeologist being as popular now as he was when he first debuted in 1981, now is a great time to get them a thoughtful gift based on the film franchise.

Fortunately, there's a ton of official Indiana Jones merchandise available, ranging from the original movies on Blu-ray to collectible action figures, behind-the-scenes books, and even a replica of the character's trademark fedora. title: The Best Gift Ideas For The Indiana Jones Fan In Your Life
